select1.hint: If you have already taken a measurement with this smartphone select "No."
If you are currently a student with part time job select student.

input.hint: Write "Environmental Science Student" if you currently study environmental science.

select1.hint: If you are currently studying environmental science at the bachelor's level select bachelor's.

input.hint: If your GPS doesn't autosave, please wait for at least a few minutes prior to manually saving to ensure high accuracy GPS coordinates.

select.hint: Pond and stone spout measurements should not be taken in the same form!

select1.hint: If the pond was artificially constructed select no.

upload.hint: Take up to four different pictures. Make sure include flowing and not flowing spouts!
Make sure include flowing and not flowing spouts!
Make sure include flowing and not flowing spouts!
Make sure include flowing and not flowing spouts!

select.hint: Multiple sources can be selected if the stone spout is supported by multiple sources!

input.hint: Enter the total number of individual stone spouts regardless of whether they are flowing or not!
Measurements should be performed from left to right when looking at the stone spouts from the front. Enter 0 for volume and time if the specific stone spout is not flowing.

select1.hint: For example, click yes if your gauge has been damaged, if you have a question, or want more information about S4W-Nepal!

upload.hint: For example, take a picture of a broken gauge.
